Monster - Class in main
An abstract class that describes a monster.
Monster(String, String, int, int, int, int, int, double, GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class main.Monster
Creates a new Monster object Sets the monster's name, description, maxHealth, damage, cost, level, healAmount and critRate with the given values Sets the monster's initial health to the maxHealth Sets the monster's maximum level based on the difficulty of the GameEnvironment object Sets the game variable to the given GameEnvironment object
